name: ING Group
goal: ING aims to deliver its financial products and services  with exemplary service, convenience and at competitive prices. This is reflected in our mission statement: Empowering people to stay a step ahead in life and in business.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: All the financial services related initiatives, policies and legislative files.
